tests.name: Quiz: QUESTIONS.txt
tests.description: Determines if the answers in QUESTIONS.txt are correct

tests.name: Main Program
tests.description: Checks if class to my_max and my_pow functions return correct results

tests.name: order3_asm Program
tests.description: Tests the code for the order3_asm program to determine is it operates correctly. To do so, it must allocate stack space correctly and call some functions with addresses within that new stack space passed as arguments.
